metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2118 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
SPIP 3.0.x before 3.0.9, 2.1.x before 2.1.22, and 2.0.x before 2.0.23allows remote attackers to gain privileges and "take editorial control" viavectors related to ecrire/inc/filtres.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2118` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 3.0.14-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.14-1').
